Reviews.Title: “Excelent accomodation”
Reviews.Author: Maria S
Reviews.Content: hi hosted byblos marina hotel dubai 2012 location excelent nice staff excellent meal beautiful view yacht club close tub station beach public people friendy polite nice time enjoy

Reviews.Title: “very friendly”
Reviews.Author: AllyODB
Reviews.Content: booked 2 nights stay return home travel agent australia arrival greeted friendly staff reception informed booking gone available quickly booked sister hotel 10 mins road arranged shuttle returned night wait little check check time clean friendly staff poolside staff understand english finally experience

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: haystacks
Reviews.Content: booked friends live emirates 200 nights worth 4star hotel situated near marina seventh floor tobacco smell clean breakfast buffet excellent value hotel

Reviews.Title: “Smelly hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: 77SAJ
Reviews.Content: started nonsense check location hill floor 3 smelled stale cigarette smoke checking word mini bar hotel staff insisted getting check 20 minutes check hotel basically call guests liars customer service somewhat note gym fitness centre hotel poor

Reviews.Title: “Close to everything you need....”
Reviews.Author: WezT
Reviews.Content: marina district brilliant lots eat walk pool little fantastic view skyscrapers miss marina mall 10 minute walk malls shopping satisfied beds nice decour fine bar downstairs people lively night im giving 4 stars

Reviews.Title: “Great location in Marina district of Dubai”
Reviews.Author: Kerzy
Reviews.Content: spent week february enjoyed minute hotel located marina district dubai perfect location beach restaurants yacht club dubai metro easy main city including airport nonsmoking comfortable clean looked marina yachts roof top pool shade mid afternoon site restaurants bar fine found breakfast little expensive probably local eateries near beach found greet little supermarket corner entrance 24 hours serves vegetable samosas little

Reviews.Title: “Great location - 5 mins walk to Metro”
Reviews.Author: Dano2011186605
Reviews.Content: dubai spending christmasnew marina byblos 4 star hotel location trimmings 5 star including etc rate excellent value bedroom decor lovely clean bed comfortable facilities english bar bands nights amadeus bar beautiful music played quartet night staff attentative helpful especially girls business centre helpful pleasant require breakfast hotel pop road hotel bobs fish chip shop happy accommodate breakfast request 7am close approx 4am definitely stay unfortunately slow recommend noise disco night didnt husband awake night hear guests complaining loud music tours company hotel expensive nearly doubt price companies check dessert safari 130 whereas hotel charging 250 city tour private car 150 instead 250 charged hotel

Reviews.Title: “good location, high quality”
Reviews.Author: farahSA
Reviews.Content: nice hotel price near walk beach tech theres bar 4 violin players nice highly recommend love classic music disappointed standard receptionist massage center wasnt enthusiastic basket fruit nor bath robe nice hotel location

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: janet0401
Reviews.Content: hotel nice bars advertised werent bu english pub staff bit disorganised 40 minutes continental breakfast service breakfast buffet excellent chef cooking eggs wait spacious clean comfy beds bit centre probably stay price

Reviews.Title: “Awsome”
Reviews.Author: Al_mobtali
Reviews.Content: hi ive 5 stars hotels hospitality visit dubai family 2 adults 2 children decided stay mentioned hotel drove car doha qatar hotel fantastic employees 5 training oriented helpfull smiling time running occupancy valet parking concierge aware city helped lot whenever destination manager morning breakfast buffet exceeds miles guest oriented starting minute enter breakfast till leave bar manager checking table outlet check guests satisfied happy awsome fantastic english pub lobby fantastic decoration unique yourself travelled time henry 8th era 4 star rated hotel service wellcoming stay expectations honestly didnt 5 stars hotels stayed worth price paid stay people running hotel doing job training follow ups handling guests complaints guys ill recommend hotel contacts whenever im dubai ill stay marina byblos hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Arabella80
Reviews.Content: stayed marina byblos 6 days november enjoyed stay stuff hospitable helpful smiling roof recreation stylish comfortable grea view pool comfy sunbeds towels food drinks variety food breakfast facilities design excellent menu couple times meal delicious hotel supermarket minute amazing view marina couple minutes reach personnaly beautiful views dubai public beach 10 min walk nearby restaurant fantastic expensive meal tube 5 min walk overall enjoyed stay marina byblos excellent pricequality balance woud rate 5 stars hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value but with minor teething issues”
Reviews.Author: dangerman_yyz
Reviews.Content: found hotel pretty price paid price log site major pros 1 location near malls public transport massage yacht club 2 staff friendly minor annoyances 1 drivers knowing tell yacht club 2 slightly cumbersome checkin process 3 issues hot water credit quick try address 4 floors nonsmoking

Reviews.Title: “perfect location and lovely hotel”

Reviews.Content: dubai try marina byblos hotel 3 months majority taxis driving city advise near waves hotel yacht club arrival welcomed fresh glass juice cold flannel excellent service spectacular views marina beds comfortable bathrooms trendy clean little gadget bed controls lighting air con impressive tv alot choice english channels internet extremely slow course free hot watter 20 minutes evening heat shower daytime fine didnt hear love litterally smoke building english pub food superb espescially buffet english pub excellent food hungry portions family 5 lol food excellent band play thurs fri nights live band singer amazing alot songs upto date songs bar huge packed friendly atmosphere dancing night 3am bar staff excellent drink hand wait 247 drinks expensive warned thats bars swimming pool roof top beautiful lots shade comfortable sun loungers pool perfect temperture highly reccommend hotel husband live definitely regular english pub reccomend hotel family friends
